verses.verse: וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Now the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> had sworn בַּמִּצְפָּ֖ה <WH4709> in Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> There shall not any מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> of us give בִּתּ֛וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְבִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> unto Benjamin לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> to Bethel וַיֵּ֤שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and abode שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> there till even לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and lifted up קוֹלָ֔ם <WH6963> their voices וַיִּבְכּ֖וּ <WH1058> and wept בְּכִ֥י <WH1065> overflowing גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> sore

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And said לָמָ֗ה <WH4100> Why יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> come זֹּ֖את <WH2063> in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> why is this come to pass in Israel לְהִפָּקֵ֥ד <WH6485> lacking הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> that there should be to day מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <WH7925> rose early הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> that the people וַיִּבְנוּ־ <WH1129> and built שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> there an altar וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and offered עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> and peace offerings פ

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִ֠י <WH4310> Who אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that לֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָלָ֧ה <WH5927> came בַקָּהָ֛ל <WH6951> not up with the congregation מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> Who [is there] among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הַשְּׁבוּעָ֨ה <WH7621> oath הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <WH1419> A great הָיְתָ֗ה <WH1961> become לַ֠אֲשֶׁר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָלָ֨ה <WH5927> concerning him that came not up אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֛ה <WH4709> to Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying מ֥וֹת <WH4191> He shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death

וַיִּנָּֽחֲמוּ֙ <WH5162> repented בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> about בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> them for Benjamin אָחִ֑יו <WH251> their brother וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said נִגְדַּ֥ע <WH1438> cut off הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> this day שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> There is one מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> from Israel

מַה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> How shall we do לָהֶ֛ם לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> for wives וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <WH7650> seeing we have sworn בַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> by the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> not תֵּת־ <WH5414> that we will not give לָהֶ֥ם מִבְּנוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> them of our daughters לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> wives

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And they said מִ֗י <WH4310> What אֶחָד֙ <WH259> What one מִשִּׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> [is there] of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> that came not up אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> to Mizpeh וְ֠הִנֵּה <WH2009> behold לֹ֣א <WH3808> no בָא־ <WH935> had come אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> none אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <WH4264> to the camp מִיָּבֵ֥ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> to the assembly

וַיִּתְפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> were numbered הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> For the people וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold אֵֽין־ <WH369> else שָׁם֙ <WH8033> was there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> and behold [there were] none מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> of the inhabitants יָבֵ֥שׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <WH7971> sent שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there הָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> And the congregation שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> warriors הֶחָ֑יִל <WH2428> of the valiant וַיְצַוּ֨וּ <WH6680> and commanded אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> them saying לְ֠כוּ <WH1980> Go וְהִכִּיתֶ֞ם <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> the inhabitants יָבֵ֤שׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> Gilead לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> with the women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> and the children

וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> And this [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> that ye shall do כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> every male וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> and every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <WH3045> by man מִשְׁכַּב־ <WH4904> that hath lain זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> A man תַּחֲרִֽימוּ׃ <WH2763> Ye shall utterly destroy

וַֽיִּמְצְא֞וּ <WH4672> And they found מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֣י ׀ <WH3427> among the inhabitants יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> Gilead אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> young בְתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> virgins אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not יָדְעָ֛ה <WH3045> that had known אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> no man לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH4904> by lying זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> with any male וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> and they brought אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> them unto the camp שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> to Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> which [is] in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan ס

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> sent כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> And the whole congregation וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> [some] to speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּסֶ֣לַע <WH5553> that [were] in the rock רִמּ֑וֹן <WH7417> Rimmon וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> and to call לָהֶ֖ם שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> peaceably

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> came again בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> And Benjamin בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> and they וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and they gave לָהֶם֙ הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> them wives אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom חִיּ֔וּ <WH2421> which they had saved alive מִנְּשֵׁ֖י <WH802> of the women יָבֵ֣שׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not מָצְא֥וּ <WH4672> and yet so they sufficed לָהֶ֖ם כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> enough

וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> And the people נִחָ֖ם <WH5162> repented לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> them for Benjamin כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> had made יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> because that the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <WH6556> a breach בְּשִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> in the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּֽאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> Then the elders הָעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation מַה־ <WH4100> shall we נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> How shall we do לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> for wives כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since נִשְׁמְדָ֥ה <WH8045> are destroyed מִבִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> Benjamin אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> seeing the women

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And they said יְרֻשַּׁ֥ת <WH3425> [There must be] an inheritance פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> for them that be escaped לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> so יִמָּחֶ֥ה <WH4229> be not destroyed שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> that a tribe מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> out of Israel

וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> Howbeit we may לָתֵת־ <WH5414> not give לָהֶ֥ם נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> them wives מִבְּנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1323> of our daughters כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <WH7650> have sworn בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אָר֕וּר <WH779> Cursed נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> [be] he that giveth אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> to Benjamin ס

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <WH559> Then they said הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold חַג־ <WH2282> Behold [there is] a feast יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּשִׁל֜וֹ <WH7887> in Shiloh מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <WH3117> year יָמִ֗ימָה <WH3117> to year אֲשֶׁ֞ר <WH834> which מִצְּפ֤וֹנָה <WH6828> [in a place] which [is] on the north side לְבֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> of Bethel מִזְרְחָ֣ה <WH4217> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> east side לִמְסִלָּ֔ה <WH4546> of the highway הָעֹלָ֥ה <WH5927> that goeth up מִבֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> from Bethel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <WH7927> to Shechem וּמִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> and on the south לִלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3829> of Lebonah

[וַיְצַו כ] (וַיְצַוּ֕וּ <WH6680> appoint ק) אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> Go וַאֲרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH693> and lie in wait בַּכְּרָמִֽים׃ <WH3754> in the vineyards

וּרְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> And see וְ֠הִנֵּה <WH2009> and behold אִם־ <WH518> if יֵ֨צְא֥וּ <WH3318> come out בְנוֹת־ <WH1323> and behold if the daughters שִׁילוֹ֮ <WH7887> of Shiloh לָח֣וּל <WH2342> to dance בַּמְּחֹלוֹת֒ <WH4246> in dances וִֽיצָאתֶם֙ <WH3318> then come ye out מִן־ <WH4480> out הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> of the vineyards וַחֲטַפְתֶּ֥ם <WH2414> and catch לָכֶ֛ם אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> you every man אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> his wife מִבְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters שִׁיל֑וֹ <WH7887> of Shiloh וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֖ם <WH1980> and go אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> to the land בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> of Benjamin

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> shall come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> come אֲבוֹתָם֩ <WH1> And it shall be when their fathers א֨וֹ <WH176> or אֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <WH251> or their brethren [לָרֹוב כ] (לָרִ֣יב <WH7378> adversary ק) אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <WH413> to us וְאָמַ֤רְנוּ <WH559> that we will say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> to חָנּ֣וּנוּ <WH2603> unto them Be favourable אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not לָקַ֛חְנוּ <WH3947> unto them for our sakes because we reserved אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> not to each man אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> his wife בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> in the war כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you נְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> for ye did not give לָהֶ֖ם כָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> unto them at this time תֶּאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <WH816> [that] ye should be guilty ס

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did so כֵן֙ <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> and took נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> [them] wives לְמִסְפָּרָ֔ם <WH4557> according to their number מִן־ <WH4480> who הַמְּחֹלְל֖וֹת <WH2342> of them that danced אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom גָּזָ֑לוּ <WH1497> whom they caught וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> went וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <WH7725> and returned אֶל־ <WH413> to נַ֣חֲלָתָ֔ם <WH5159> unto their inheritance וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> and repaired אֶת־ <WH853> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> the cities וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and dwelt בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיִּתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <WH1980> departed מִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> there בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> thence at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְשִׁבְט֖וֹ <WH7626> to his tribe וּלְמִשְׁפַּחְתּ֑וֹ <WH4940> and to his family וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> and they went out מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> from thence every man לְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> to his inheritance

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every man הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> in his own eyes יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> did
